member.name: SIP_CAP_SET
member.summary: The SIP_CAP_SET structure defines the capabilities of a subject interface package (SIP).

member.name: SIP_CAP_SET.cbSize
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: SIP_CAP_SET.dwVersion
member.summary: The SIP version. By default, this value is two (2).

member.name: SIP_CAP_SET.isMultiSign
member.summary: A value of one (1) indicates that the SIP supports multiple embedded signatures. Otherwise, set this value to zero (0).

member.name: SIP_CAP_SET.dwReserved
member.summary: Reserved for future use. Set this value to zero (0).
